desc: Occours when user cancels loading of an image
Occours when input focus is removed from a form element
Occours when the user clicks on a link or form element
Occours when the value of a form field is changed by the user
Occours when an error happens during the loading of a document or image
Occours when input focus is given to a form element or a window
Occours when a page is loaded into the navigator
Occours when the user moves the pointer off a link or clickable area
Occours when moves the pointer over a hypertext link
Occours when the user clears a form using the Reset button
Occours when the user slects a form element's field
Occours when a form is submitted
Occours when the user leaves the page
